schema.name: Meal 2020-11-15

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the scallops and shrimp under cold water and pat them dry.
Boil the egg until hard-boiled, then cool, peel and slice.
Chop the lettuce, dice the onion, and slice the tomato.
In a pan, sear the scallops over medium-high heat until golden brown on each side, about 2 minutes per side.
In the same pan, cook the shrimp until they are pink and opaque, about 2-3 minutes.
Assemble the salad by placing the lettuce in a large bowl. Top with the cooked scallops, shrimp, sliced egg, diced onion, and tomato slices.
Toss gently to combine and serve immediately.

schema.description: Dive into a high-protein, low-carb meal with this exquisite scallop and shrimp salad. Perfect for those following a health-conscious diet without sacrificing flavor. Enjoy a mix of succulent scallops and tender shrimp atop a crisp bed of lettuce, complemented by fresh tomato and a hint of onion for a tantalizing dish that's both nutritious and delicious.
